Pigeonhole Principle

DM
Jun 18, 2021

If $k>0$ and $k+1$ objects are placed in $k$ boxes then at least one box will have more than one objects.

Generalized Pigeonhole Principle

DM
Jun 18, 2021

If $N$ objects are placed in $k$ boxes then there is at least one box containing at least $\lceil {N \over k} \rceil$ objects.

Division Rule

DM
Jun 18, 2021

If there are $n/d$ ways to do a task then the procedure could be done in $n$ ways where each way $w$ exactly $d$ of $n$ ways correspond to $w$.

Combinatronics

DM
Jun 18, 2021

Study of arrangement of objects.

Rules of Inference

DM
Jun 17, 2021

Recursive Algorithms

DM
Jun 17, 2021

An algorithm is recursive if it solves the problem by reducing it to an instance of same problem with smaller input.

Recursion

DM
Jun 17, 2021

Process of defining an object in terms of itself.

Program Verification

DM
Jun 17, 2021

A program is said to be correct if it generates correct output for every possible input.
